website_summaries.verdict: Wii MotionPlus definitely provides some impressive moments in gaming; we just wish it was incorporated in the original Wii remote.
pros: Allows for 1:1 movement onscreen for Wii games that support it
cons: won't work with older Wii games

customer_reviews.title: Works, however
customer_reviews.text: This helped me upgrade my old Wii controllers to this new "wii motion plus" shit that I could use to play Zelda Skyward Sword. However, I just disagree with the entire concept of "wii motion plus" it's kind of extortion where Nintendo decides "we're going to make a better controller without a new console but also new games we put out will require this now." I don't like it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ogleari

customer_reviews.title: Beat Amazon Prime!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how fast it arrived and without Amazon Prime!!! Even though I have Amazon Prime I ordered this (not through prime 2 day shipping) along with two other items WITH Amazon Prime 2 day shipping, this arrived FIRST! The package was secured with peanuts, the item box was in new condition and sealed at both ends. When I opened the box it was the original item wrapped in it's original plastic with the installation guide and also an instruction book in original plastic. I tried it out and it works Great! What more can you ask for!
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: It Worked as if it was Brand New
customer_reviews.text: The Wii Motion Plus module arrived on time with no damage. Plugged it into the Wii remote and worked just like the other 2 Motion Plus modules we already had. When I need an additional module, I will first check with this seller before anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: J.Pimentel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: Newer models of the Wiimote came out with this sensor built into them, but if you have older Wiimotes, this is a must buy. Always go with the Nintendo version. I bought this from Amazon Warehouse and it was in new condition, really. They are the best resellers and the description always matches the item.
customer_reviews.author: Andumo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Description
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to my Nintendo Wii, but I have a complaint with the way it was listed and sold. I was under the impression that I was getting a full controller with the silicone sleeve and the additional Wii Motion Plus cartridge on it, and instead all I got was the additional cartridge and a silicone sleeve to fit the new addition. This was very misleading. Now I will have a black controller with a white motion plus on it. It will be functional, but look bad. I considered returning it, but didn't want to go through the hassle. The cartridge will do what it's designed to do and that is what is important at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Daly

customer_reviews.title: works okay
customer_reviews.text: This isn't really something that you buy as an optional piece of hardware; most buy it for Wii Sports Resort and similar games. I haven't done a side-by-side comparison in using the Wii with and without the MotionPlus, but I'm sure there is some difference. My biggest complaint is when playing Wii Sports Resort. The swordfighting becomes uncalibrated extremely easily to the point that I can't advance in the game because of the hindrance this device is causing. It's extremely frustrating and I wish there was something that could be done without having to pause every 10 seconds to recalibrate.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Saves you from buying new Wii remote
customer_reviews.text: If you have the Wii remotes without MotionPlus already in them, this accessory will be perfect to give them the missing functionality for games that require it, and saves you from having to buy new Wii remotes that already include the feature. On the downside, this will make your Wii remote a little bulkier, and uncomfortable to play games that require you to hold it sideways. And, as you would imagine, it's a little annoying having to replace the accessory since it has its own sleeve, and having to put your old sleeve back on the remote and vice-versa when replacing it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Zamora

customer_reviews.title: Improves wand performance. Superior quailty rubber
customer_reviews.text: This is a soft-rubber cover which overlaps the hand-unit, adding height, better control and some cushion on the outside. I'm surprised at how much I do like it, it seemed frivolous when I first purchased it, but after using it and comparing the hand-unit without it, it's absolutely a good and worth while addition to the hand unit. The material is a soft rubber which I've taken off and put back on many times - it does not rip or tear, but is very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Shaunagain

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is an attachment for the original Wii controllers. It works great and makes a huge difference with accuracy and response when playing the Wii games. A small piece snaps onto the bottom of the original controller which makes it a little longer. It comes with a protective cover so you don't even notice the extra piece. It is necessary to have more control with a lot of Wii games especially the Wii fit since many of the challenges require fine motor control. The only disadvantage is that it won't fit into the steering wheel which is fun to use in some of the Wii games. Ordering through Amazon was terrific. Great price and very reliable. Shipped out very fast.
customer_reviews.author: zambi44

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Works, Cheaper than a new remote.
customer_reviews.text: Previously I've bought a Wii Remote Plus from a somewhat sketchy seller and, while it worked, this was a much easier piece to use. The extra inch or so adapter on the end is slightly funky but I don't really notice it when playing and it's a very cost effective way to upgrade old Wii Remotes for newer games, specifically Wii U titles. Comes with the extended rubber case which is awkward but not unreasonable, and you can just slip the adapter out if you want.
customer_reviews.author: The Yeknod

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know how well this worked until I tried my friend's wii remote with the motionplus built in. This motionplus attachment has just the right amount of control to it. In other words, it's not so sensitive to the point where it's shaky and hard to control. If you're playing a game that has a lot of shooting or aiming then this is the best choice you can go with. It's like the difference between shooting the bow in Ocarina of Time on the N64 (super easy) and on the gamecube (that darn sensitive joystick!).
customer_reviews.author: Medvjed

customer_reviews.title: A necessary evil
customer_reviews.text: Well, you pretty much need a couple of these if you get some of the new games that require it. They don't rape you as bad as you might expect on the price, and it does make a tremendous difference, as you can see most between Tennis on the original Wii Sports and Table Tennis on the newer Wii Sports Resort. It is super-annoying, however, how difficult it is to activate controllers on Wii Sports Resort vs. Wii Sports. I am not sure if that is a function of the new piece on the controller or not, but I assume it must be.
customer_reviews.author: MussSyke

customer_reviews.title: Husband likes it
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a gamer, myself, but it's enjoyable watching my husband get so much enjoyment out of playing this after a hard week at work. We only play once every few months (well, he plays, I watch) but this attachment seems to enhance the entire gaming experience. I bought it with the Zelda: Skyward Sword game, and it seems that it helps with whatever it is the main character needs to do on the quest in the game. I bought it as a gift, and he enjoys it. If he's happy, I am too.
customer_reviews.author: Cosplay mangaka

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I purchased a Wii machine, mainly hoping to provide me with some exercise as I am disabled. We purchased the Wii Sport Resort and purchased two of the Wii MotionPlus attachments as they were recommended. The game is more fun than any video game machine I have ever seen, with accurate movements needed to compete in the events provided in the sim. This would not be possible without the MotionPlus. If you love the Wii, the MotionPlus attachment is one of the most important accessories you can buy.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Garland

customer_reviews.title: Limited usefulness
customer_reviews.text: The Wii MotionPlus does what it's designed to do in the 1 game that I own that can take advantage of it, but the number of titles that use it are still very limited. I use it in 'Tiger Woods 10', and it does make the Wii Remote more responsive and accurate. Perhaps in the future, almost all games can take advantage of the MotionPlus, but right now there are very few. One other advantage to the MotionPlus is that it gives the Wii remote a little more heft. I find it a plus when playing sports games.
customer_reviews.author: DLH

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: The remote works fine, but not much better than the old remote. It keeps needing to be recalibrated. However, I have a problem with Nintendo because the design of the origincal nunchuck appears that Nintendo knew that they were going to change the Wii remote, which is a marketing ploy so people will be forced to spend more money on new hardware inorder to play certain games. This remote is not much better than the original remote, however it is necessary to play the game Wii Sports Resort.
customer_reviews.author: It is me

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: I am not even wanting to give stars because it was a scam, the item was not even in the box when we got it!!!! So angry and man were my kids disappointed. Do not order from this seller. The box only contained the cover but no motion plus controller component.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Wii Motion Plus
customer_reviews.text: Technology marches on! This is the newest add on to the Wii for the Wii Sports Resort. It tracks your movements much more accurately and makes games like Ping Pong feel like a real game. You can even put spin on the ball. If you have enjoyed Wii Sports, you will welcome this addition which comes included with the Wii Sports Resort. You must purchase an additional one of these for each additional player with their own controller playing at the same time. Wear the wrist strap and watch out for the player next to you. I know someone whose child sailed on of these controllers through his plasma television set.
customer_reviews.author: B. Boyce

customer_reviews.title: Tough to tell
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if this is supposed to have an impact on all Wii games or just the motion sports ones like Wii Sports and Wii Sports Resort. I have noticed a tremendous difference in my bowling and golf (especially golf where my bad slice really shows through!), but for Wii Fit Plus, I haven't noticed anything different. It is nice to make things seem more realistic though and takes adjustment from the "cheating" style I had adopted with some sports!
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Domeier

customer_reviews.title: Great addition
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what the complaint is about this NOT making a difference over the regular controller. I played Tiger Woods Golf 10 without motion plus then with it... Night and Day!!!! It feels like a golf simulator using the mp. For those crying about the price, DON'T BUY IT! They are trying to make money. They are selling a good product for a price the market will bear. They don't owe you anything. I want value for my money, and I am satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bludog

customer_reviews.title: Wii Motion Plus Controller
customer_reviews.text: Motion Plus does give you more intricate motion is specially configured Wii games & activities. It does get a little shaky at times & you must sit it down for a few moments for it to recalibrate itself. Overall a good product with limited usefulness. It does connect up to the Wii remote control easily but has to removed when I place remote in a charging stand then reassembled when the battery is charged, not a big problem but a little inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Bob_E

customer_reviews.title: Intermittent Function
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to go with a game (that prefers motionplus) for my son's birthday. I was impressed with it shipping the same day I ordered it and all seemed fine during first use. However, every use since requires numerous disconnect and reconnect actions to keep it working. It simply stops functioning until you unplug it from the remote and plug it right back in. Very disappointing but I guess I should have expected that with the low price.
customer_reviews.author: H. Steinhardt

customer_reviews.title: Wii Motion Plus is a little shakey
customer_reviews.text: First, I am not rating a game. I happen to love the game I'm currently playing, but I can't play it without the Wii Motion Plus and that is a bit of a minus. This controler needs to constantly be recalibrated during game play. The motion is slightly laggy. Maybe by the next generation, they will work out the bugs. Maybe Nintendo will be left so far behind there won't be another generation. You will need lots of batteries and patience.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mclaren

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This is great. It works perfectly. Every tiny movement really does count. If only the Wii had been made with this superior remote, it could have been so much more successful. I got the attachment for Wii Sports Resort, and it took no getting used to. Playing becomes immediately natural and intuitive when you use this. I'm currently playing Skyward Sword with the same attachment, and I see no wear or tear; functionality is just the same. I highly recommend this if you have, or are thinking of getting, a Wii.
customer_reviews.author: Willow W

customer_reviews.title: A sealed box with only plastic and a manual, nice.
customer_reviews.text: You know, I'd like to give an official review, BUT, I seemed to have paid 30$ for a "new" box and plastic bags that have been opened. It was sealed and labeled as new, which is the best part!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Lampman

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these since I ordered them some time ago. The motion plus work fantastic, trust me I am surprised that I have not worn them out. It is a little different than using a regular remote because you added an additional inch to the remote's bottom and you have to adjust where you place your fingers. Other than that a great remote.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: MotionPlus a BIG Plus
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty simple. I saw the commercial for Tiger Woods PGA 10 for Wii w/ MotionPlus. I bought the combo package which included the game and one MotionPlus adapter. The game is unbelievably fantastic. I had to share it, so I bought Wii Resort w/ included MotionPlus, and two additional MotionPlus so that I now have one for each WiiMote. MotionPlus makes the Wii exponentially more capable of producing true-to-life gameplay. No regrets!
customer_reviews.author: S. Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: It's too pricy for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: The wii motion plus is a great attachment for the wii remote, because it makes all of the things you do on the wii even more realistic. But I don't think it should be required to play some games. If it was optional, people would probably buy more of that game, knowing that they wouldn't have to spend an extra 25 dollars on the wii motion plus. It is a very useful add-on to the wii remote. I just think it should cost less, because it's nice, but it's not worth 25 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: PlusWii Motion
customer_reviews.text: Read a ton of reviews that were so-so for this add on. I bought this after seeing the blurg that come with the Tiger Woods Golf 10 and thought it would be great to give a try. In this household we are split 50-50 on if it adds realism. But put it this way, I have trouble beating my partner with the add-on attached vrs her playing without the add-on but if I make a poor shot-- it TELLS ME. It does also reward me with a well placed and correct percentage shot which are easier to achieve with the MotionPlus. Over all I believe it adds a bit more realism, which is what we look for, correct?
customer_reviews.author: Glen A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Wii MotionPlus
customer_reviews.text: Love the new motion plus. Golf is much more enjoyable at Wii sports resort. I bought three more so everyone in the house can play together. We love bowling as a family and you can really notice the spin control difference from the standard Wii controller. I have not noticed any change in battery consumption. At first I was concerned that it would eat up the batteries really fast but that does not seem to be the case.
customer_reviews.author: M. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great item, expensive shipping
customer_reviews.text: Bought this out of necessity since some of the games require it. It does make the controller chunkier but at least it saves me money in the long run. This shipping of $8 each was a bit ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Alexis Turcios

customer_reviews.title: Good for the young who have quick reflexes and steady hands!
customer_reviews.text: For an older person, this made the remotes too sensitive. I gave them away to our pastor's son last weekend, who was delighted with them. He has been using one on his remote and wanted to get some for his other three as well. So they are in "steadier hands" now that will appreciate the extra sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: YTE

customer_reviews.title: the accessory even makes regular games smoother
customer_reviews.text: the accessory makes games not optimized with Wii Motion Plus feel a little bit smoother as well. i'd recommend that anyone considering getting this who doesn't have a Wii Remote Plus or this accessory on one of their remotes already should get at least one to see how it is. there's a noticeable difference in control with games that don't utilize it as well, but ones that do are much better. it's so much more precise. i'd like to eventually get one for all three of my old style remotes. for now, i only need the one to play.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Not all I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Wii Motion Plus for "Grand Slam Tennis". Although it does make the remote more sensative, it commonly caused the Artificial intellegence to overrun the ball and to swing prematurely. I have found the game more fun and less frustrating when I use the remote without the Motion Plus. I will hope that the Motion plus is more to my enjoymenmt when I get the new Tiger Woods 2012 golf game.
customer_reviews.author: J. F. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT say 'adapter only' nor anything about no silicone cover anywhere in listing. Pictures and description are for adapter and silicone cover - only adapter is shipped, repackaged.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Gabbert

customer_reviews.title: Actually does what they said it would do.
customer_reviews.text: As an avid player of tennis on wii sports, and having reached the pro level with over 2000 points, I still felt that the wii remote wasn't as responsive as I would have liked it to be. When I read that the wii motion plus would give you more control with the remote as to your swings, slices, cuts, backhand and topspin, I ordered a pair and truly that's what I have experienced so far. It is an amazing attachment and it works the same majic with all other games too.
customer_reviews.author: Fly Guy

customer_reviews.title: Inexperienced Wii Player
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased Wii Remotes from a department store but didn't know that I need a Motion Plus Remote to play certain games. After growing frustrated with the customer service and high prices in department stores, I found a reasonable seller on amazon.com and directed my questions towards them. They answered my questions, helped me purchase all of the products that I needed, and made me and my children very happy.
customer_reviews.author: AprilShowers

customer_reviews.title: Not a good and clear description
customer_reviews.text: Not a good and clear description! I thought it will be in the box like in the picture, and I just received 2 Wii MotionPlus in some plastic pieces. And the protect remote are not included and it's not precise!
customer_reviews.author: Aurelie Conroux

customer_reviews.title: The inexpensive alternative to Wii MotionPlus remote
customer_reviews.text: When the MotionPlus was first introduced it was packaged like this, as an attachment to your existing remotes. If you are tight on cash and can't afford to get the remotes with built-in MotionPlus I definitely recommend this as an alternative. It comes with a case as well so it just snaps into your existing remotes.
customer_reviews.author: Raina Casarez

customer_reviews.title: Wii Motion Plus
customer_reviews.text: I can only speak to the Wii Motion Plus (WMP) in regards to playing Grand Slam Tennis. I found that finding a neutral position was very difficult, requiring awkward adjustments, and movement when going to swing glitchy. When your moving to swing it will occasionaly hit the ball before your ready, however, once you master the variety of skills (e.g., top spin, slice, etc.) the position of the ball is fairly accurate. In my opinion, the WMP is just average with the main advantage being increased accuracy of the variety of swings once mastered.
customer_reviews.author: LMN

customer_reviews.title: Adding Wii MotionPlus
customer_reviews.text: It's takes a little bit of time to get used to MotionPlus. Just when you thought you had the knack of the games and knew exactly how to move, along comes MotionPlus. It really detects your movements! One small issue is that we have to unhook the MotionPlus and pull back the cover to continue to use our charging station. Overall a great addition to the Wii.
customer_reviews.author: mom43boys

customer_reviews.title: Better Gaming
customer_reviews.text: As with any product there are always improvements and upgrades. Wii improved the gaming experience with this MotionPlus add-on. It does what it says by making your movements more accurate and therefore making the games more enjoyable to play. I am looking forward to more games coming in the future that take advantage of this device.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dell

customer_reviews.title: Wii MotionPlus! Amazing and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I chose to give this five stars because it was shipped to our house in excellent condition, and it is super fun to use on your wii! A lot of people I saw gave this bad reviews because the controller would glitch out or whatever, but we haven't experience any of those problems so far! Great product! I would recommend it to anyone who enjoys playing the wii! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jem

customer_reviews.title: Should have already been incorporated....
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised but should have just been incorporated into the ORIGINAL controller... This just makes you realize that Nintendo rushed to get this Wii out before this was polished properly... When you play Sports Resorts... which by the way is a blast, you can see though that this simply was something that should have originally done before market release.... In all though, works great! This 'review' asks for a 'fun' and 'overall' rating... It's marked at halfway not because of the 'product' but ONLY because of Nintendo! Not Amazon's product base either! I love you Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Wii Motion Plus remote = <3
customer_reviews.text: It's everything that it says and more, the Wii Motion Plus remote was so easy to put the jacket in. I love how it makes every movement that you do actually sync up to the games that I tried. I use it on the new Sport Resort and it's amazing. My only downside was that the archery was really hard to do but I don't think that it's the game's or the remote's fault... ^___^;;
customer_reviews.author: Smiling book reader

customer_reviews.title: Wii Motion Plus
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to add to my regular Wii remote. I received a Wii Motion Plus remote for Christmas & found out the advantage of the Motion Plus. When you play a game with the motion plus it gives you an advantage of scoring as it feels your moves more than just the regular remote.
customer_reviews.author: jujubug

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: These controller additions were a great help for our newer Wii U games that required the motion plus. They are clunkier and less convenient, but they work exactly as advertised. They absolutely work, which was the thing I was most concerned about.
customer_reviews.author: BiologyProfessor

customer_reviews.title: wii motion plus
customer_reviews.text: purchased this as a gift for a grandson for Christmas. He has several wii games, and this was something he wanted. I know nothing about such things, but the young ones these are highly technichal with their entertainment, and this is just the tool he wanted to make his wii interaction more versatile.
customer_reviews.author: J. Doerr

customer_reviews.title: Takes the wiimote to the next level
customer_reviews.text: One of the most annoying things about Wii SPorts was in golf when trying to putt, you hammer the ball. With the Montionplus, that is gone. The 1:1 motion is great. The only downside is that it doesn't work with most games and there are only 2 so far that I know with it. I'm sure future games will be able to take advantage of it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: A must if you have the original wii motes.
customer_reviews.text: Great item to make your wii mote more accurate. I wish they had built it in the wii mote in the first place as I found it a waste to discard the original jackets. Anyway, it does its job and my kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: Da di di do du

customer_reviews.title: Oh nintendo
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe Nintendo suckered me into buying this! It really doesn't add THAT much control over the Wii remote since this was basically made for the Wii Sports Resort game. Nintendo should have already included this with all Wii Remotes when it was first released.
customer_reviews.author: Tetris911

customer_reviews.title: Fun if not for glitches
customer_reviews.text: The MotionPlus adds some fun extra sounds/vibrations to the game, but I was a little annoyed that I was required to purchase one in order to play the game at all. My particular unit is glitchy, as the nunchuck will often have communication issues with the MotionPlus unit and cause Link to spin in circles or move in various directions, as if the joystick were being pushed in that direction. This does not happen with any other game when the MotionPlus is not connected. It's very annoying, especially when it happens while I'm trying to beat a boss or complete a difficult side challenge which requires careful joystick control.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item thinking I was getting the real deal. I don't think that it is. Moreover, it does not work very well at all. My children have had problems with it from the beginning. I should have returned it when I had the chance.
customer_reviews.author: Redell

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for great grandaughter and she has used it to play her sports games. She get lots of exercise playing her games. We live in a rural area where it's difficult for her to get together with other kids to play sports daily and with this she can play sports every day..
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: This new remote is cool
customer_reviews.text: I like the new MotionPlus remote, but the only thing that it annoying about is calibrating it and when you accidentally disconnect it, you have to calibrte it again. That gets annoying but other than that this thing is great. I should also mention that Wii Sports Resort is my favorite Wii game.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Wii Does It Again!
customer_reviews.text: Our two most-used games are golf and bowling - and compared to the package that came with the Wii, we find the motion sensor really does help make the Wiimote more sensitive to your hand movements. Also fun - the sword games, frisbee, wakeboarding - and the bicycling will definitely give you a workout!
customer_reviews.author: Temptd2

customer_reviews.title: Required for some games, adds virtually nothing
customer_reviews.text: I needed this to play certain Wii games that required the enhanced motion detection. I didn't notice any exceptional change in the Wii experience. Maybe other people have, but I wouldn't waste the money if your game doesn't require it.
customer_reviews.author: goinggone14

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Used it with Skyward Sword
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Used it with Skyward Sword. Doesn't come with the sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for Skyward Sword. Thanks Ninty for not making us all buy a new controller entirely.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gimmicky! Wii still doesn't really work the way it should. Attachment makes the controller too long.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Wii Motion Plus is Definitely a PLUS
customer_reviews.text: This device was really easy to add to the existing controllers. I think this item should disappear in the future, however and just be integrated with all new Wii product packages. Silly for people who purchase a Wii in the future to have to buy the controller an then the adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Motion Sensor is more sensitive
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the motion sensor for my second remote along with the Wii Sports Resort Game. I love the game and I think the motion sensor does make the remote more sensitive. This is a great feature, but I realized the original remotes gave me a false sense of the ability to win :-) I totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Fish

customer_reviews.title: Great for Wii Games
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot cheaper than buying a remote wii plus. I find it works better, and see no difference in performance. I especially like the silicone protection. This is a great buy for a great price by fulfillment-solutions!
customer_reviews.author: Thao Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Wii MotionPlus
customer_reviews.text: I was excited because of the cost and because it arrived so fast we could play all the games before my kids left for home again. The first motion plus I bought cost me close to 50 dollars. I couldn't afford another one at that price. Amazon had one I could buy a few if necessary. Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Naomiac

customer_reviews.title: great for two
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a grandchild's birthday. I didn't think it was a very exciting gift but it has proven to be very popular. she is competitive and also a child who shares and this allowed her to play against someone and also to include others when she is playing.
customer_reviews.author: Tekawitha

customer_reviews.title: Motion Plus
customer_reviews.text: Very responsive motion plus for Wii remote. It works really well for all the games which need motion sensor. With the new remote from Wii which has inbuilt Motion Plus, don't think it will be required.
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: The product works great - almost as good as the original accessory. I say almost because sometimes (repeat, sometimes), it takes a tad longer to calibrate than the original one. And if you notice very minutely, you will see it has slightly different sensitivity than the original. It is not a bother for most games as it is hardly noticeable. For games like Golf, you can always adjust your swing. But again, the difference is very slight. Oh, and it comes with a nice rubber jacket too that fits your now longer remote very well.

product_meta.title: Wii MotionPlus
product_meta.description:
Wii MotionPlus

AMAZON.COM
Simple. Intuitive. Easy to use. Connect the Wii MotionPlus accessory to your Wii Remote controller to increase accuracy and enhance play control on compatible games. Look on the back of Wii Game Disc packaging to see which games are specially designed for use with Wii MotionPlus. Wii MotionPlus contains additional sensors that make the Wii Remote respond to the slightest movement, motion, or twist of the wrist. Wii MotionPlus must be used with a Wii Remote, which is sold separately.

Wii MotionPlus Compatible Titles:

Virtua Tennis 2009 – SEGA
The world’s top tennis stars are hitting the courts again this May in SEGA’s Virtua Tennis 2009 for Wii. Now every swing is more precise and the action is more intense, thanks to the Wii MotionPlus. Other updates include brand new courts, a new roll call of tennis stars to compete against and even more court mini-games.

Tiger Woods PGA TOUR 10 – EA Sports
From EA Sports, experience a near perfect 1:1 swing with the Tiger Woods PGA TOUR 10 bundle, featuring Wii MotionPlus. Elevate your game with an enhanced, true-to-life golf swing that features precise draw-fade capabilities and authentic sports motion.

Grand Slam Tennis - EA Sports
Can’t get enough tennis? Excitement is in full swing with Grand Slam Tennis from EA Sports. Compatibility with the Wii MotionPlus accessory makes it possible to spin your racket and control your in-game player with superior responsiveness and control.

Wii Sports Resort - Nintendo
Just as with Wii Sports, people will love competing against friends and family. As the competition heats up, Wii Sports Resort is as much fun to watch as it is to play. First-time players will find it easy to pick up a Wii Remote and jump into the action. A wide range of activities will keep players coming back for one more round. Some sample activities include Sword Play, Power Cruising (racing a personal watercraft ) and Disc Dog, which involves accurately tossing a disc to a cute, Mii-like dog.
